entry.title: Start Local VPS using Qemu on Windows 7

link.title: Start Local VPS using Qemu on Windows 7

entry.content:
In my recent situation, i need to run a local vps like environment with docker compatibility. These are steps:

  • Installation

  • Create Dynamic Image for Storage

    qemu-img create -f qcow2 container_server.qcow2 20G

  • Run a VM with Cloud Image

     qemu-system-x86_64 -name ubuntu -m 1024 -smp cores=2 -boot d -hdd ..\qcow\container_server.qcow2 -cdrom ../iso\ubuntu-16.04.4-server-amd64.iso -net nic,model=virtio -net user
entry.summary: In my recent situation, i need to run a local vps like environment with docker compatibility. These are steps:

entry.title: Welcome to the Forestry Demo Site!

link.title: Welcome to the Forestry Demo Site!

entry.content:
Welcome to the Belkirk College of Engineering Demo Site!

This site allows you to explore Forestryâ€™s features and functionality, and is not meant to be used as a production website. To get started building your own site, please see our documentation.

Thank you for choosing to demo Forestry!
entry.summary: Welcome to the Belkirk College of Engineering Demo Site!
